## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a4c774c66c886693b125c705573bcf15587bb2320aec1b977d51399406abb433)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'req-os' @ 20.5.17 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
